main event: Witnesses observed an aircraft with 2 bright lights flying approximately 2,000 ft in the air, tracked by radar before it disappeared.
interesting points: The lights were reported to be very bright and maneuverable.,The object appeared metallic in color.,The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes.,The object was tracked on radar.,Another report mentioned a flash and explosion in the sky related to a different UFO incident near Salina.
